oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The |xam hunt springbok. Sentences and Words (B II. 350-353, 363; L II.-1. 196-201, 250 and 251; L II.-4. 476-478); further by /a!kunta (B I. 67-157, etc.; L I.-1. 1-94, 97-114, 118; 2. 120-130, 134-137). 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Seeking springbok
